heading: Thursday Night
text: Mainly clear in the St. Lawrence Valley, otherwise gradual clearing. Lows from zero to 10 above, cold spots 5 to 10 below. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30, except low to mid 30s in southeastern valleys. Winds becoming west 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Friday Night
text: Increasing clouds. Snow showers likely in New York, mainly after midnight, with a rising chance elsewhere west of the Greens; chance late east of the Greens; a trace to an inch of accumulation. Lows in the low to mid teens, some single digits in the colder spots north. Winds becoming light and variable east of the Green Mountains, becoming south 5 to 10 mph in areas west of the Greens.
